description: Replacement windows to front and rear, replacement of two rooflights, refurbishment of the rear first floor terrace including installation of new balustrade and replacement of section of trellis with timber cladding, creation of an external door opening at basement level, refurbishment of courtyard at rear lower ground floor level,  installation of an air conditioning system (including installation of condenser unit at roof level within a timber clad acoustic enclosure), rationalising RWPs and SVPs to rear, like for like replacement of lift motor enclosure and internal alterations. (Linked to 20/04408/LBC)
